game.title: Puppet Master – Clicker Destruction and Ragdoll Fun
name: Puppet Master
puppet-master
game.s_dis: Puppet Master is a clicker game where you unleash destruction on a toy puppet using a variety of weapons, perfect for stress relief and chaotic fun.
game.l_dis:
Play Puppet Master – Ultimate Clicker Destruction Game

Puppet Master – Unblocked lets players release stress by destroying a toy puppet with an arsenal of weapons. From knives and machine guns to rockets, unleash chaos and unlock new destructive tools as you progress.

What is Puppet Master?

Puppet Master is a ragdoll-based clicker game where the objective is to inflict as much damage as possible on a puppet. Players can choose from multiple weapons, earn upgrades, and enjoy a humorous yet action-packed destruction experience.

How to Play

  • Select a weapon: Choose knives, guns, rockets, and other destructive tools.
  • Click to attack: Use mouse or touch input to deal damage to the puppet.
  • Unlock more weapons: Progress and unlock new tools of destruction.
  • Maximize destruction: Aim for combos and efficient use of weapons.
  • Replay: Continue experimenting with different weapons for fun and stress relief.

Key Features

  • Variety of Weapons: Knives, guns, rockets, and more to destroy the puppet.
  • Ragdoll Physics: Realistic reactions of the puppet for comedic destruction.
  • Clicker Gameplay: Simple yet addictive mechanics for quick fun.
  • Progression: Unlock new weapons and levels of destruction as you play.
  • Stress Relief: Enjoy a safe and humorous way to vent frustration.

Why Play Puppet Master?

If you enjoy clicker games, ragdoll physics, and over-the-top destructive fun, Puppet Master provides hours of entertaining stress relief and chaotic gameplay.

Unleash Chaos!

Choose your weapons, destroy the puppet, and become the ultimate Puppet Master!
